user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>All natural remedies are completely safe and have no side effects.
Vaccines cause autism.
Climate change isn't real.
Eating organic foods will eliminate your risk of getting cancer.
All religions are equally valid and true.
Money can't buy happiness.
Social media has no negative impact on mental health.
Working long hours is the best way to achieve success.
Everyone deserves a second chance, no matter what they did.
Children raised in single-parent households always struggle later in life.
All animals are friendly and want to be our friends.
The best way to get over a breakup is to immediately start dating someone else.
Listening to classical music will make you smarter.
It's easy to become a millionaire if you just work hard enough.
The Earth is flat.
All politicians are corrupt and selfish.
Reading in dim light won't damage your eyesight.<COMPLETION_END>
